titles.title: Double Taxation Elimination and Economic Growth Act of 2003
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to give a deduction to corporations for dividends paid and to exclude dividends from gross income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/7/2003--Introduced. Double Taxation Elimination and Economic Growth Act of 2003 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to: (1) allow, for a corporation, a deduction for dividends paid; and (2) tax dividends received by individuals as capital gain.
